1.title: The medieval period begins after what event?

b.answer: The fall of the Western Roman Empire

d.answer: Charlemagne reunites most of western Europe

2.title: Charlemagne left what effects after his death?

a.answer: The church gained power as the highest authority

b.answer: The Holy Roman Empire grew even stronger by his successors

c.answer: Traditions across western Europe became mixed

d.answer: The Holy Roman Empire split into four parts
